thread.title: Grant given to MiCHEP will help educate prisoners in Michigan
thread.title_full: Grant given to MiCHEP will help educate prisoners in Michigan

author: @WAFB
title: Grant given to MiCHEP will help educate prisoners in Michigan
text:
Updated: 15 minutes ago
We're sharing wishes for Bennett, Ben, Eversyn and Elise
Updated: 33 minutes ago
Several Ypsilanti parents are in ICE custody after agents confronted them at a school bus stop during drop-off Tuesday morning.
Updated: 35 minutes ago
|Some local schools have announced delays and closures due to student and staff illnesses.
Updated: 41 minutes ago
CyberTips led to the arrest of a Richland County resident for exposing a child to harmful material, officials reported Wednesday.
Updated: 45 minutes ago
|Professionals say a little insulation can save hundreds of dollars and headaches.
summary: We're sharing wishes for Bennett, Ben, Eversyn and Elise Several Ypsilanti parents are in ICE custody after agents confronted them at a school bus stop during drop-off Tuesday morning. |Some local schools have announced delays and closures due to student and staff illnesses. CyberTips led to the arrest of a Richland County resident for exposing a child to harmful material, officials reported Wednesday. |Professionals say a little insulation can save hundreds of dollars and headaches.
